official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent veterans from being disqualified from
			 contributing to health savings accounts by reason of receiving medical
			 care for service-connected disabilities under programs administered by the
			 Department of Veterans Affairs.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Helping Veterans Save for Health Care Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Helping Veterans Save for Health Care Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Veterans not disqualified from health savings account by reason of receiving medical care for
			 service-connected disabilities under programs administered by the
			 Department of Veterans Affairs

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the
			 following new subparagraph:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
for a service-connected
			 disability (within the meaning of

text.#text:
An individual shall not fail to be treated as an eligible individual for any period merely because
			 the individual receives hospital care or medical services under any law
			 administered by the

header.#text: Special rule for individuals eligible for certain veterans benefits

text.#text:
The amendment made by this section shall apply to months beginning after the date of the enactment
			 of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4900 IH: Helping Veterans Save for Health Care Act of 2014
